message_history.content:
Answer the given question. You must conduct reasoning inside <think> and </think> first every time you get new information. After reasoning, if you find you lack some knowledge, you can call a search engine by <search> query </search> and it will return the top searched results between <information> and </information>. You can search as many times as your want. If you find no further external knowledge needed, you can directly provide the answer inside <answer> and </answer>, without detailed illustrations. For example, <answer> Beijing </answer>. Question: I would like to know the operating performance in 2024 of the companies granted casino concession contracts by the Macau government. Specifically, I am interested in each company's net gaming revenue and non-gaming revenue, both expressed in millions with one decimal place with HKD, and the currency clearly indicated. Additionally, for each company’s associated five-star deluxe hotels or resorts recognized by Macao Government Tourism Office (if applicable), I would like to know the number of rooms, occupancy rate, average daily rate (ADR), and revenue per available room (RevPAR). If some data is unavailable, the corresponding fields should be marked with "-".

Please output the sorted data with each Luxury 5-Star Hotel/Resort hotel as a row in the format of one Markdown table. The column names in the table are as follows:

Year, Gambling Enterprise, Net Gambling Revenue (in millions), Non-Gambling Revenue (in millions), 5-Star Deluxe Hotels/Resorts, Number of Rooms, Occupancy Rate, Average Room Rate, Revenue per Available Room

Net Gambling Revenue (in millions), Non-Gambling Revenue (in millions), Average Room Rate, Revenue per Available Room are all in Hong Kong dollars. For conversions between Hong Kong dollars and US dollars, please use the given exchange rate: 1 US dollar = 7.85 Hong Kong dollars.

Don't ask me any questions, just output the results according to the column without omitting cells arbitrarily. The output format is ```markdown
{data_content}
```.?

To achieve this task, I need to gather comprehensive details about the specific companies that have received casino concession contracts from Macau government along with their associated luxury 5-Star hotels/ resorts. However, finding precise operational performance figures specifically for 2024 seems challenging due to limited public availability. 

<search>operating performance of companies granted casino concession contracts by Macau government in 2024</search>

Search query: operating performance of companies granted casino concession contracts by Macau government in 2024
Result: [Doc 1](https://ir.studiocity-macau.com/news-releases/news-release-details/studio-city-international-holdings-limited-announces-24):
Studio City International Holdings Limited Announces Unaudited ... Revenue from casino contract was US$75.9 million for the first quarter of 2025, compared with US$66.9 million for the first quarter of 2024. Revenue from casino ...

[Doc 2](https://asgam.com/2025/06/25/macau-sports-betting-operator-macau-slot-reports-us16-million-profit-in-2024-new-one-year-concession-granted/):
Macau sports betting operator Macau SLOT reports US$16 million ... Macau SLOT – Macau's only sports betting concessionaire – reported a profit of MOP$130 million (US$16.1 million) in 2024, representing a slight 5.5% increase ...

[Doc 3](https://www.state.gov/reports/2025-investment-climate-statements/macau):
2025 Investment Climate Statements: Macau The Government of Macau collected gaming tax revenue of $11 billion in 2024, accounting for 81 percent of the total government revenue of $13.7 billion. Macau ...

Based on the provided references,

<search>net gambling revenue and non-gaming revenue of companies granted casino concession contracts by Macau government in 2024</search>

Search query: net gambling revenue and non-gaming revenue of companies granted casino concession contracts by Macau government in 2024
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.state.gov/reports/2024-investment-climate-statements/macau):
2024 Investment Climate Statements: Macau - State Department The GOM collected gaming tax revenue of $8.1 billion in 2023, accounting for 77% of the total government revenue of $10.5 billion. U.S. investment in Macau over ...

[Doc 2](https://igamingbusiness.com/casino/integrated-resorts/macau-grade-casino-operators-non-gaming-contributions/):
Macau to grade casino operators on non-gaming contributions Macau is planning a review of casino operators' mandated non-gaming investments. The Big 6 are required to put MOP130 billion into non-gaming expenditures.

[Doc 3](https://www.wynnmacaulimited.com/static-files/ee56254a-26db-424a-a89d-962451b44b70):
[PDF] 2024 Annual Report 年度報告 - Wynn Macau Investor Relations Gross casino revenues are measured by the aggregate net ... According to the Gaming Concession Contract granted by the Macau government and the.

Unfortunately still missing specific numbers:

Result: [Doc 1](https://www.macaotourism.gov.mo/es/accommodation/search?class=5-star-hotel):

10 Best Luxury Hotels in Macau One of the top Macau luxury hotels according to guest reviews is Legend Palace Hotel. Make use of concierge services and a steam room during your stay here.
